attributes.action: Deselect any MP that went against their own constituency
attributes.background: I hope to make the parliamentary elite have to justify and explain why they went against the wishes of their constituents during Brexit

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
